setPossibilitiesList() - Method in class p3.Game.Mastermind
create an array list containing all the secret code possibility function of the number element, with or without code composed of duplicate. ( i.e if duplicate are allowed code list will contain this kind of secret code : 1122,1111,25446....)
subMenu(int, String) - Method in class p3.Configuration.P3Menu
This method create the submenu in function of the needs add the quit and main menu to the options 0- play submenu 1- replay submenu 2- config submenu 3- rules and help submenu and display
